name: Obesity
description: Obesity means having too much body fat, which can make you unhealthy.
treatment: In some cases, doctors prescribe weigth-loss medicines like 'Orlistat'.  but life lifestyle changes are the best cure.
prevention: 1.avoid fast food and soft drinks   2.Stay active by walking or doing physical work

name: Diabetes
description: Diabetes happens when your blood has too much sugar because your body cannot use insulin properly.
treatment: 1. Metformin (helps control blood sugar  2.insulin(used in serious cases).
prevention: 1.reduce sugar intake  2. Drink plenty of water

name: hypertension
description: it means the force of your blood against your blood vessels is too high, which can cause heart problems.
treatment: Amlodipine and Losartan (help lower blood pressure)
prevention: 1.Eat less salty and oily food 2.Control stress

name: Heart Disease
description: Heart disease happens when the heart’s blood supply is blocked, leading to chest pain or a heart attack.
prevention: 1.Eat less fat and more fiber-rich food  2.Stay away from smoking and alcohol

name: Depression and Anxiety
description: Depression is a mental health problem where a person feels sad, hopeless, and tired all the time.
prevention: 1.Talk to a therapist or a trusted person  2.Do activities that make you happy, like listening to music or exercise

name: PCOS (Polycystic Ovary Syndrome)
description: PCOS is a condition where a woman's hormones become unbalanced, causing irregular periods, acne, weight gain, and difficulty in getting pregnant.
treatment: 1.Birth control pills (to regulate periods).  2.Metformin (helps control insulin levels).
prevention: 1.Eat healthy, home-cooked meals   2.Avoid junk food and sugary drinks.

name: Fatty Liver Disease (Non-Alcoholic)
description: Fatty liver happens when too much fat builds up in the liver, making it hard for the liver to work properly.
treatment: 1.Vitamin E supplements (help protect liver cells).   2. Pioglitazone (used in some cases).
prevention: 1.Reduce sugar and processed food in your diet. 2.Drink green tea and eat foods rich in antioxidants

name: Asthma and Allergies
description: Asthma is a condition where breathing becomes difficult due to swelling in the airways. Allergies happen when the body reacts to dust, pollen, or food.
treatment: 1.Inhalers (Salbutamol, Budesonide) to open the airways.  2.Antihistamines (Cetirizine, Loratadine) for allergies.
prevention: Wear a mask in polluted areas. 2.Avoid smoking or secondhand smoke.

name: Cancer
description: Cancer happens when cells grow abnormally and form lumps (tumors), which can spread to other parts of the body.
treatment: 1.Different medicines are used depending on the type of cancer. 2.Targeted therapy drugs
prevention: 1.Eat antioxidant-rich foods like berries, green tea, and turmeric. 2.Stop smoking and reduce alcohol intake.

name: Autoimmune Diseases
description: Autoimmune diseases happen when the body’s immune system attacks its own cells instead of protecting them.
treatment: 1.Levothyroxine (for thyroid problems). 2.Steroids (for lupus and other autoimmune conditions).
prevention: 1.Avoid stress as it can make autoimmune diseases worse. 2. Get enough sunlight for Vitamin D.

name: Osteoporosis and Vitamin D Deficiency
description: Osteoporosis means bones become weak and break easily. Vitamin D deficiency happens when the body doesn’t get enough sunlight, leading to weak bones
treatment: 1.Calcium tablets to strengthen bones. 2.Vitamin D supplements for better calcium absorption.
prevention: 1.Spend 15-30 minutes in sunlight every day. 2. Eat dairy products and leafy greens.

name: Migraine
description: Migraine is a severe headache that causes pain on one side of the head. It often comes with nausea, vomiting, and sensitivity to light and sound.
treatment: 1. Paracetamol, Ibuprofen (pain relievers).  2.Triptans (for severe migraine attacks).
prevention: 1.Maintain a regular sleep schedule.  2.Maintain a regular sleep schedule.

name: Insomnia (Sleep Disorder)
description: Insomnia is a condition where a person has trouble falling asleep or wakes up too early and feels tired all day.
treatment: 1.Melatonin supplements (help regulate sleep).  2. Sleeping pills (only under doctors advice).
prevention: 1.Avoid caffeine before bedtime. 2.Keep the bedroom dark and quiet for better sleep.

name: Acne and Skin Problems
description: Acne is a common skin problem where pimples, blackheads, and whiteheads appear, mostly on the face.
treatment: 1.Benzoyl peroxide, Salicylic acid (help clear acne).  2.Retinoid creams (reduce pimples and scars).
prevention: 1.Eat fruits and vegetables instead of oily food.  2.Avoid stress, as it can trigger acne.

name: Kidney Stones
description: Kidney stones are hard deposits of minerals that form inside the kidneys, causing severe pain when passing urine.
treatment: 1.Painkillers (Ibuprofen) to reduce pain.  2.Alpha-blockers (help pass stones easily).
prevention: 1.Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily.  2.Reduce salt and junk food intake.

name: Eye Check-up
description: An eye check-up is a routine examination to assess vision and detect any eye-related issues or diseases.
treatment: 1. Prescription glasses or contact lenses for vision correction. 2. Eye drops for dryness or infections. 3. Surgery for serious conditions like cataracts or glaucoma.
prevention: 1. Regular eye check-ups every 6-12 months. 2. Limit screen time and take frequent breaks. 3. Maintain a healthy diet rich in Vitamin A. 4. Wear protective eyewear in bright sunlight.
